localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A small weekend project visualizing the estimated cost of the Ever Given cargo ship blocking the Suez canal. Has a silly feature where you can guess when the blockage will be over.
blogPost.body: A small weekend project visualizing the estimated cost of the Ever Given cargo ship blocking the Suez canal. Has a silly feature where you can guess when the blockage will be over.
blogPost.title: Suez Canal Blockage - See how much it costs & guess when the blockage is over
blogPost.author: Elias

localize.description: 一个周末的小项目，可视化的Ever Given货船堵塞苏伊士运河的估计成本。有一个愚蠢的功能，你可以猜测什么时候堵塞会结束。
localize.tagline: 看看要花多少钱&猜猜看什么时候堵完了

localize.description: 一個週末的小項目，可視化的Ever Given貨船堵塞蘇伊士運河的估計成本。有一個愚蠢的功能，你可以猜測什麼時候堵塞會結束。
localize.tagline: 看看要花多少錢&猜猜看什麼時候堵完了

previous.excerpt: Exashape is an app that allows you to challenge your own memory. It has a minimal interface with a single focus: "challenging your memory".
previous.title: Exashape - A minimalist game to challenge your own memory

localize.description: Exashape是一款让你挑战自己记忆力的应用。它的界面极简，只有一个重点："挑战你的记忆力"。
localize.tagline: 一款挑战自己记忆力的极简主义游戏

localize.description: Exashape是一款讓你挑戰自己記憶力的應用。它的界面極簡，只有一個重點："挑戰你的記憶力"。
localize.tagline: 一款挑戰自己記憶力的極簡主義遊戲

What’s the biggest determinant of market prices?

(a) interest rates

(b) valuations

(c) Reddit memes

(d) 7x leveraged family offices w/a history of insider trading

localize.full_text:
新的CFA二级考试题。

决定市场价格的最大因素是什么？

(一)利率

(b) 估值

(c) Reddit备忘录

(d) 7倍杠杆家族办公室，有内幕交易历史

新的CFA二級考試題。

決定市場價格的最大因素是什麼？

(一)利率

(b) 估值

(c) Reddit備忘錄

(d) 7倍槓桿家族辦公室，有內幕交易歷史
